name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Firmware Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications within healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C/C++**, **RTOS**, and **Linux**, with a strong understanding of **AXI**, **AHB**, **MMU**, and **DMA**. Experienced in implementing secure systems through techniques such as **secure boot**, **anti-rollback**, **cryptographic signatures**, and **trust chain** methodologies. Skilled in hardware interfaces including **PCIe**, **NVMe**, **SATA**, **SCSI**, with hands-on experience with **JTAG**, **UART**, and **ICE**.

Possessing a solid foundation in telemetry and advanced security protocols, including **ransomware simulation** and **heuristics**. Additionally, I bring expertise in **Python** for automation and telemetry tasks, alongside strong version control skills with **Git**. Recognized for delivering compliant solutions adhering to industry standards and best practices. My background also includes building AI/ML-powered platforms, leveraging technologies like **FastAPI**, **Django**, **MLflow**, and **Airflow** to enhance operational efficiencies.
